items.translated_title: A New Jersey lawsuit shows how hard it is to fight deepfake porn
items.content: For more than two years, an app called ClothOff has been terrorizing young women online — and it’s been maddeningly difficult to stop. The app has been taken down from the two major app stores and it’s banned from most social platforms, but it’s still available on the web and through a Telegram bot. In […]
